snippet: A combination of disorders that increases the risk of cardiovascular disease and diabetes and is associated with cognitive deficiencies in adults now shows a similar effect in teenagers.
abstract: A combination of disorders that increases the risk of cardiovascular disease and diabetes and is associated with cognitive deficiencies in adults now shows a similar effect in teenagers.

headline.main: Metabolic Syndrome and the Teenage Brain
headline.print_headline: Vital Signs | Patterns: Metabolic Syndrome and the Teenage Brain
